name: Space Runner (Ahmed Elshazly, Lehomar2vinci, VikS)
description:
Space Runner

You play as an astronaut who is running away from a black hole. Occasionally  cracks in the space-time continuum will appear and let you teleport further away from the black hole!

Controls:

A & D keys - Move left and right

Evade the obstacles on your path

Collect medkits to heal yourself

Enter the portals to get further away from the black hole

Credits :

Code : https://ahmed-elshazly.itch.io

Art  : Viky Shen 

Sound : Lehomar2vinci
